meanings.definition: The state of being one; unity.
meanings.sent1: The oneness of the team's spirit led them to victory.
meanings.sent2: The oneness of the choir's voices created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent3: The oneness of the puzzle pieces made it easy to complete.
meanings.sent4: The oneness of the colors in the painting symbolized peace.
meanings.sent5: The oneness of the family's bond was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being whole or undivided.
meanings.sent1: The oneness of the cake made it delicious.
meanings.sent2: The oneness of the book's plot kept me engaged.
meanings.sent3: The oneness of the jigsaw puzzle was satisfying to complete.
meanings.sent4: The oneness of the melody touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The oneness of the forest was calming and peaceful.

meanings.definition: The fact or state of being in agreement or harmony.
meanings.sent1: The oneness of opinions among the group made decision-making easy.
meanings.sent2: The oneness of the band members' playing created a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent3: The oneness of flavors in the dish surprised and delighted the guests.
meanings.sent4: The oneness of the dancers' movements was like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The oneness of the community's goals brought everyone together.
